name: Ex-Spelled
description:
Hello, this is Ex-spelled: a game where you play as a magical student in a magical school that must stop an unstable textbook to avoid getting expelled.

The controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move Space bar to jump and double jump.

I hope you enjoy our game

https://afells.itch.io/ - Programmer/level designer

https://jacobmeleras.itch.io/ - Programmer

https://monnettie.itch.io/  - Artist

https://oskar-swiatowski.itch.io/ - Sound

https://jacobmeleras.itch.io/ - Music
